features: HEAVY DUTY CUTLERY—This package contains eight packs of 24 utensils (8 forks, 8 spoons, and 8 knives in each pack), for a total of 192 utensils
100% COMPOSTABLE—These disposable forks, spoons, and knives are compostable in industrial composting facilities (not suitable for backyard composting)
MADE FROM PLANT-BASED MATERIALS—Molded plant fibers make these a more sustainable alternative to regular plastic cutlery
EASY CLEANUP - Perfect for catering, concessions, church events, food trucks and more
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE—We want you to be happy with your purchase! If you have any issues, please contact us via the hotline number on the back of the package so we can help
body.description: With Hefty ECOSAVE 100% Compostable Cutlery, you won’t have to choose between simple cleanup and sustainability. Made from a durable plant-based material, these disposable forks, spoons, and knives are 100% compostable in industrial compostable facilities. This cutlery is ideal for picnics, camping, concessions, catering, and more! Get disposable cutlery with Hefty savings and strength trusted by millions of Americans, now with added sustainability. Don’t forget: all Hefty products are backed by a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hefty ECOSAVE for Any Occasion! Plates, Bowls & Trays Stock up on Hefty ECOSAVE plates, bowls and trays for your next family meal. This molded fiber tableware is a more sustainable alternative to paper plates and makes cleanup easy! Straws & Cutlery Keep things simple and sustainable with the full line of Hefty ECOSAVE products, which also includes straws & cutlery. Hinged Lid Containers If you're a small business owner or hosting a gathering that needs on-the-go containers, Hefty ECOSAVE has you covered with a variety of sizes to fit all of your carryout needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this due to the pricing on amazon versus elsewhere. It was a great deal for a pack of 8. Bought this for everyday use but we may end up using it for a party. Great quality and we love that its biodegradable. Would buy again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strongest disposable cutlery
reviews.reviewText: This is the strongest disposal cutlery I’ve ever used. I can even use it to cut steak. I wish I could buy additional forks separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty - not even close
reviews.reviewText: Fork will snap if you hold a piece of food with it and try to cut the food.Spoon will snap wh you try to mix granola into your yogurt.Knife is OK.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty for plastic
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is thick!! Much sturdier than other utensils and is worth the extra money if you are big boy like me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, commercially compostable only
reviews.reviewText: These are actually pretty sturdy. More sturdy than typical disposable silverware. There is a statement on each utensil that says commercially compostable only, which means that you can't just toss these in a compost bin at home to break down. So, if you're wanting to compost these at home, you can't. There is no mention of that on the product page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely the best choice for hot foods
reviews.reviewText: I can't express how well these hold up better than other brands when I go to cut a freshly cooked chicken platter at work for lunch. They are still susceptible to warping but not as bad as other more known plastic silverware brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: i had cutlery like on the same track as this and they not good. I was very surprised at how strong these are.they had a nice hand feel and were surprisingly thick. I did re-wash them twice and use them and they were fine. I normally don't wash the disposables but i decided to do it to do this review. if they help the environment by breaking down and not staying like plastic for years and years, it's a plus in my book. i try to be eco friendly but it's really not that easy but products like this make it a bit easier. Friday night we had linguini and shrimp scampi and i made everyone use these forks and not one person had a problem. the tines were sharp enough to piece the food without breaking and no problem twirling the linguini either. they are the same size as my stainless steel cutlery, which i love. Most of the disposables are smaller and feel lightweight and fragile. I love Hefty products so i was not surprised that Hefty did it right. I did order 2 more sets of these. I pack a lunch and breakfast every day for work and i use plastic utensils so now i use these. Great product. if you are using plastic utensils and you find them flimsy, try these. They are almost like using regular cutlery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the convenience combines with being eco friendly.
reviews.reviewText: Not going to lie. I am a busy mom who picks and chooses her battles. I am ALL about convenience. However, recently my conscious has been getting the better of me and I have been trying to be more eco friendly. I have shifted all my plastic cups and plates to a compostable product. So now it was time for cutlery! So when you think of cutlery you obviously want a product that doesnt break at the first bite and can hold up. These are PERFECT. They are durable and honestly can't really tell its an eco friendly product. The way you can tell is the price. While you are paying more, you are paying more because this product won't just leave around plastics on the earth. BTW these don't just decompose in your garden, a professional composter is needed. Other than that I am so pleased with this product!!
